choices.text:
Below is an instruction that describes a task. Write a response that appropriately completes the request.

### Instruction:
Write an email to my boss letting them know I am leaving the company

### Response:

Dear [Boss's Name],

I hope this email finds you well. As of today, May 31st, 2023, I am resigning from my position at [Company Name].

I have thoroughly enjoyed working with you and the rest of the team at [Company Name] over the past [number of years]. Your leadership and guidance have been invaluable in helping me grow both personally and professionally.

I am grateful for the opportunities I have had to work on exciting projects, learn from experienced colleagues, and contribute to the success of our company. However, after careful consideration, I have decided that it is time for me to move on to new challenges and opportunities.

I will be available to assist with any transition or handover duties as needed. Please let me know if you need anything else from me before my last day on May 31st.

Thank you again for the opportunity to work at [Company Name]. I wish you continued success in the future.

Sincerely,

[Your Name]
